Publication Title: Relapsed pediatric acute myeloid leukaemia: state-of-the-art in 2023
Publication Abstract: Although outcomes of children and adolescents with newly diagnosed acute myeloid leukemia (AML) have improved significantly over the past two decades, more than one-third of patients continue to relapse and experience suboptimal long-term outcomes. Publication Title: Preclinical development of 1B7/CD3, a novel anti-TSLPR bispecific antibody that targets CRLF2-rearranged Ph-like B-ALL
Publication Authors: Ze Tian, Chunhua Shi, Guojun Yang, Jason K Allen, Qing Shi, Amin Ai-Shami, Jill Wardell Olson, Melinda G Smith, Qing Chang, Jasbir Kaur, Junping You, Timothy E Lofton, Michelle A Gonzalez, Qi Zhang, DongXing Zha, Sarah K Tasian, Nitin Jain, Marina Y Konopleva, Timothy Heffernan, Jeffrey J Molldrem
Publication Abstract: Patients harboring CRLF2-rearranged B-lineage acute lymphocytic leukemia (B-ALL) face a 5-year survival rate as low as 20%. While significant gains have been made to position targeted therapies for B-ALL treatment, continued efforts are needed to develop therapeutic options with improved duration of response. Publication Title: Alternative splicing of its 5' UTR limits CD20 mRNA translation and enables resistance to CD20-directed immunotherapies
Publication Authors: Zhiwei Ang, Luca Paruzzo, Katharina E Hayer, Carolin Schmidt, Manuel Torres-Diz, Feng Xu, Urvi Zankharia, Yunlin Zhang, Samantha S Soldan, Sisi Zheng, Catherine D Falkenstein, Joseph Patrick Loftus, Scarlett Y Yang, Mukta Asnani, Patricia King Sainos, Vinodh Pillai, Emeline R Chong, Marilyn Li, Sarah K Tasian, Yoseph Barash, Paul M Lieberman, Marco Ruella, Stephen J Schuster, Andrei Thomas-Tikhonenko
Publication Abstract: Aberrant skipping of coding exons in CD19 and CD22 compromises responses to immunotherapy for B-cell malignancies. Here, we show that the MS4A1 gene encoding human CD20 also produces several mRNA isoforms with distinct 5' untranslated regions (5'-UTR).
